tool_description: Offload your server resources with Bingo API! It is a straightforward API that generates  Bingo cards in US and EU  game standards (75 or 90 numbers). Feel free to play with it with the free Basic Plan. If you have suggestions or requests just drop me a line.
title: BingoAPI

api_list.name: /us
api_list.description:
US game spec.
Returns numbers between 1 and 75, randomized in 5 groups.

If you have a paid plan you can specify the number of cards to generate as a query parameter: `?cards=10`
This will return an array of array (the cards).

Please note that empty spaces are not returned as it is more portable for who don't need them. You are free to loop through the cards and add them at your wish.

api_list.name: /eu
api_list.description:
EU game spec.
Returns numbers between 1 and 90.

If you have a paid plan you can specify the number of cards to generate as a query parameter: `?cards=10`
This will return an array of array (the cards).

Please note that empty spaces are not returned as it is more portable for who don't need them. You are free to loop through the cards and add them at your wish.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bingoapi.p.rapidapi.com/eu"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bingoapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
